sect1.title: General
sect1.para:
The SW component QTG implements the application logic for the prioritization and output of acoustic acknowledgement requests, which (depending on the installation) can be output to the vehicle user via an DWA-sounder, a simple horn or the horn. QTG component receives and prioritizes acoustic acknowledgement requests of the applications:
Central door locking (ZV)
anti-theft protection (DWA)
terminal control QTG currently integrates library functions(init_qtg(), cyclic_qtg()) and connections with Components that are established through RTE. Note: Components are those components that QTG interacts with, for more details, see VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ApplicationLayer.ZV_Lib.SW Architecture.QTG.QTG Static.QTG Context
